title: CS Bonus Hunter - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   e-Sports   Friendship   Gamers   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Romantic Subplot   Teamwork
author: Ding Ding Er (Zhang Shuo)   丁叮儿（张硕）
description: 2002, Nanjing, a group of young people from various walks of life found themselves bond together by their common love for CS. What started as an attempt to make a living as hired guns in the video game quickly lead them on to the path of competing for WCG championship. Could this rag-tag band make a name for themselves during the dawn of e-sport, and could obtain something more than money in the process?'>
